title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 400.6 - Reports of arrests, convictions, etc
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 400.6 - Reports of arrests, convictions, etc

State Regulations
A written report shall be made to the superintendent of any
arrest, indictment or conviction (including any plea bargaining agreement) of
any stockholder, director, officer, owner, partner or employee connected with
the business of the licensee, for the violation of any law within 10 days after
such arrest, indictment or conviction becomes known to the
licensee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
400.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
